knimeNode.name: Boosting Predictor Loop End
knimeNode.shortDescription: Loop end node for predicting a boosted ensemble model

fullDescription.intro: Together with the corresponding loop start node a boosting prediction loop can be constructed. It uses the weighted models an creates a prediction based on a majority vote of all models.
fullDescription.option: The column from the first input table that contains the weight for each model The column from the second input table that contains the prediction from each single model

ports.inPort: The data with the weight for the current model
The table containing the predictions from the single models
ports.outPort: The classes predicted by the boosted model
